rooms.name: Living & Dining Area
rooms.description: A spacious open-plan living area with a modern aesthetic including an integrated kitchenette and dining space. The area is designed to serve as the primary communal zone with ample natural light through south-facing windows.

rooms.name: Bedroom
rooms.description: A minimalist bedroom featuring built-in storage and a king-size bed. The room is designed to be peaceful with limited clutter and features east-facing windows to promote positivity.

rooms.name: Library
rooms.description: A dedicated library space with custom shelving and ambient lighting. The layout is optimized for quiet reading and study, incorporating north-facing windows to enhance clarity and concentration.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: A compact bathroom with modern fixtures, ensuring privacy and efficient use of space. The location is designed away from the main living area following Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Study/Work Area
rooms.description: A multipurpose work area that can serve as a study or home office. The design includes ergonomic furniture and adequate task lighting. It is positioned to maximize productivity and minimize distractions.

openings.description: Main entrance ensuring optimal flow of energy into the space.
Secondary exit facilitating easy access to private outdoor spaces or garden areas.
